Description: Cloud-based Bill of Materials (BOM) and Inventory management system for engineering teams, manufacturing companies, and supply chain.
Name: OpenBOM

Methods.Name: List Updated BOMs
Methods.Description: Returns boms accessible by the user that have been updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Top Level BOMs
Methods.Description: Returns only top level boms accessible by the user that have been updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List BOMs
Methods.Description: Returns all boms accessible by the user.

Methods.Name: List Updated Order BOMs
Methods.Description: Returns order boms accessible by the user that have been updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Order BOMs
Methods.Description: Returns all order boms accessible by the user.

Methods.Name: List Top Level BOMs
Methods.Description: Returns all only top level boms accessible by the user.

Methods.Name: List Updated Catalogs
Methods.Description: Returns catalogs accessible by the user that have been updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Catalogs
Methods.Description: Returns all catalogs accessible by the user.

Methods.Name: List Catalog Items
Methods.Description: Returns all items for this catalog.

Methods.Name: List BOM Items
Methods.Description: Returns all items for this BOM.
